TEXT: The applicant is a NORP national born in DATE . He is currently detained in LOC prison .
On an unspecified date in DATE , the applicant was convicted of burglary and sentenced to imprisonment .

DATE and DATE , the applicant stayed at FAC . He was admitted to that facility after he had been diagnosed as suffering from anaemia and from an infection on the inside of his left cheek . The applicant underwent a histopathological examination which showed that the condition of his cheek was not cancerous but rather caused by a self - inflicted injury . In addition , a haematologic examination led to the conclusion that the applicant ’s anaemia resulted from a heavy loss of blood caused by self - inflicted injuries as well . The applicant was treated with ferric preparations . When his condition improved , he was discharged from the hospital and transferred to a nearby residential facility of FAC . However , an examination of the applicant conducted DATE showed a low level of haemoglobin and a loss of tissue on the inside of his left cheek . He was brought back to the hospital , where he was given a blood transfusion which led to an improvement of his condition . On DATE , the applicant was discharged from the hospital and transferred to PERSON prison .

On DATE , the applicant was admitted to ORG , where he was diagnosed as suffering from anaemia , an infection of his left cheek and suspected self - mutilation . During his hospitalisation in that facility , he underwent the following examinations : blood , urine and stool tests , a chest x - ray , an ultrasound of the abdominal cavity , ORG , histopathological , dental and rectal examinations . He was also examined in the maxillofacial surgery ward . Moreover , the applicant was treated with CARDINAL different medicines and received a transfusion of red blood cells . Subsequently his condition improved and on DATE he was transferred to ORG prison .

On DATE , the applicant lodged a complaint with ORG concerning the allegedly inadequate medical care he had received in ORG . On DATE , his complaint was transmitted to the District Director of ORG in GPE . On DATE , the District Director rejected the complaint as unfounded . He pointed out that during his hospitalisation , the applicant had undergone several examinations and had received pharmaceutical treatment . He further informed the applicant that he agreed with the doctors who had examined him and had found that no other treatment was required by his condition . In addition , the District Director observed that it appeared that the applicant had been mutilating himself by bloodletting and advised him that any further self - mutilation would lead to a deterioration of his state of health .

In a letter of CARDINAL DATE addressed to the District Director of ORG , the applicant contested the conclusions stated in the Director ’s letter of DATE . On DATE , the Director informed that applicant that he saw no reason to change his position and objected to the insults the applicant had used in his letter against prison doctors , in particular to a comparison of FAC with a concentration camp .
On DATE , the Penitentiary Judge dismissed the applicant ’s complaint concerning the allegedly inadequate medical treatment received by him at FAC .
On DATE , ORG informed the applicant that she had requested his medical file to be submitted to her in order to investigate his complaint about inadequate medical care provided by ORG .
On DATE , a physician from PERSON prison provided the applicant , upon his request , with a health certificate which described his state of health as “ average ” .
